Descriptions: The name of the user, as they’ve defined it.
The user-defined location for this account’s profile.
The user-defined UTF-8 string describing their account.
Example: MyNewsNE a dedicated multi-lingual media house from North Eastern India.

Descriptions: Time and date, when the account was created.
The number of followers a account currently has.
The number of friends a account currently has.
The number of favorites a account currently has
When true, indicates that the user has a verified account
UTC time and date when the Tweet was created
The actual UTF-8 text of the Tweet
Example:
Australia to Manufacture Covid-19 Vaccine and give it to the Citizens for free of cost: AFP quotes Prime Minister
#CovidVaccine

Descriptions: All the other hashtags posted in the tweet along with #CovidVaccine
Utility used to post the Tweet, Tweets from the Twitter website have a source value - web
Indicates whether this Tweet has been Retweeted by the authenticating user.
